Articles.Content:
I'm new to KSP wich I discovered on Steam.

I like to send things in space.

I'm french spoken people but I can speak english not so bad.

You're speaking English great; good job!

I hope more of your launches are successful than otherwise, and if they blow up; let the fireworks show be pretty!

-Naten
Good job on the English speaking. Not the easiest thing to learn with all the exceptions. Also a tip: avoid going to Jool first. Try going to Eve or Duna first.

Hi,

Before going to Eve or Duna I must go on Mun or Minmus but I don't want to go fast, one thing at a time.
